attributes.action: More help with diagnosis for children and teenagers with ADHD
attributes.additional_details: Not too let children suffer with this condition when it can be treated. Prioritise children who self harm and ones who are struggling to go to school or are in trouble with the law and abuse substances. Help the children and parents that are crying out for help!!!!
attributes.background: Take away ridiculous waiting list times for children who are desperate for a diagnosis.  Prioritise those who are self harming and into substance abuse and crime. Also help children struggling in school so they can actually leave with good grades. Fund schools to help these children succeed in life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Provide funding to reduce waiting times for ADHD assessment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/660454
